description:
Rentt Faina has hunted monsters for the last 10 years. Sadly, he’s not great at his job, stuck hunting slimes and goblins for a few coins each day. His luck turns when he finds an undiscovered path. At the path’s end, he meets his demise in the maw of a legendary dragon. But, he wakes up as an undead bag of bones! He sets out to achieve Existential Evolution and rejoin the land of the living.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed 3 days early on some streaming sites. The original TV broadcast started on January 8th, 2024.
synonyms: เส้นทางพลิกผันชองราชันอมตะ

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description: Started off as a composite artist.
__Masahiro Tateno__, better known as Juvenile, is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TkashiWatanabe)

Joined Top Craft as an animator while still attending university, switched his focus to directing in the late '80s.

Married to [Miyata Naomi](https://anilist.co/staff/220081/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_silmeria_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_silmeria_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/54631733)
Hideki Furukawa is an animator and animation director.
__Yukiko Shikano__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.
